FuncDef: This command triggers the periodic global re-optimization of all dynamic bypass LSP paths associated with RSVP P2P LSP. The operation is performed at each expiry of the user configurable bypass LSP re-signal timer.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the time, in minutes, MPLS waits before attempting to re-signal dynamic bypass LSP paths originated on the system. Values-30 to 10080.
